import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import useValid from '../../hook/validationhook' import { modelaction } from '../../store' import Modal from '../UI/Modal/modal' import classes from './signin.module.css' let Signin = () => { let show = useSelector(state => state.mode.showmodel) let dispatch = useDispatch() let modalhandle = () => { dispatch(modelaction.Dontshow()) } let { } = useValid let submithandle = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return ( show &&
) } export default Signin
